posted:Posted December 31, 2022
msg:This was my second time staying at the Ritz and it was another amazing and relaxing trip! We booked the garden villa and it was everything we expected. Our butler Jarvis was very attentive and accommodating and made our trip the best it could be! He really was one of the best parts of the trip. He booked our reservations for dinner in a timely manner and always made sure we were taken care of! He also brought our deliveries from the lobby to our villa. Breakfast was good with many options. The facilities were all completed from my last stay and were very nice. The meals offered at the various restaurants are very delicious and worth the money. Overall, my stay was amazing! I will definitely we be staying here every time I travel to Sanya. 

A few updates/ suggestions  I would recommend . The villa pool is covered  by trees so it doesn‚Äôt get much sunlight in the winter. So I would recommend trimming the trees that surround the pool. The deck for our villa also needed some updates because it had many loose boards. The last thing is, with the epidemic situation, I wish they would have enforced  everyone to wear masks at the buffet. Besides that the stay was nothing short of fantastic! Will stay here again for sure. 

Again, thank you Jarvis for your hard work during this rough time and while being short staffed. Looking forward to our next trip.

posted:Posted July 21, 2022
msg:This by far is one of the nicest resorts in all of Yalong as well as Sanya. The Ritz not only offers wonderful stays, but also customer service that can hardly be matched by others. Thank you to Demi for our late night check in, and helping us adjust our booking on bed preferences. 

Room: very clean, ample water, fruit and useful toiletries. 

Amenities: 
buffet breakfast is really hard to beat, we woke up really early each day to make the 7am open and it was perfectly quiet and peaceful. The mix between western and Chinese food really soothes my soul. To finish a big breakfast off, the pastries and snacks are absolutely delicious. The hotel restaurants are a bit pricey if you missed the buffet, but and absolute must try if you can!  It was quite easy to Waimai goods over, so it‚Äôs always a good alternative. 

The beach was under construction but The Ritz has its own sandy beach type area for lounging, volleyball or soccer. You don‚Äôt really miss out on anything and it‚Äôs still lovely. 

The pools are wonderful, I especially loved how many lifeguards and staff were available at given point, feeling safe and cared for. 

Although it rained a bit, we were still able to enjoy much of what was on offer, however we did seem to miss out on the lobby bar- which looked nice, too.

msg:As soon as I entered the hotel, the concierge at the door was smiling and each of them was given a Ritz chain, which was a very good welcome ceremony. However, this feeling did not last when I checked in. The check-in staff had no smiles on their faces. Because I arrived at the Ritz around 13:30, the room was not cleaned yet, and I had to wait for about 1 and a half hours. So here comes the problem of facilities: there is no air-conditioning in the entire Ritz, public areas and corridors outside the room (not that there is no air-conditioning, but that it is not turned on). The receptionist took me to the spa to wait for check-in, and the air-conditioning had to be turned on immediately. It took more than an hour for the whole space to become cool. It felt very hot and irritable during this hour. It is recommended that the hotel should at least provide a cool area for guests to wait if they need guests to wait patiently for check-in! Hygiene: After checking into the room, the good impression returned. First of all, the sea view of the room is great. The most important thing is that there is no dead corner in the hygiene. It is really clean. I touched every pillar in the hotel lobby with my hands. There was no dust. The glass I saw was wiped very bright. One of my three stars is for the hotel's outdoor landscape design, and two stars are for the cleaning management and cleaning staff. During the three days and two nights I stayed, the cleaning staff was busy, but they were able to smile and greet the guests warmly when they met. They are much better than the hotel reception staff! Service: I won't mention the name of the housekeeper here. Obviously, the training was not in place. He actually asked me at 1:00 pm on the second day of my stay what time I would check out on the third day. Do you want me to leave quickly or arrange for the next wave of guests? I checked out normally at around 12:00 on the third day. The housekeeper asked me at around 11:10 if I needed to clean the room and replenish disposable items? ? ? After I checked out, the car I called arrived. The receptionists at the door were chatting there, and the doorman just stood in the corner and looked at me. They had no sense of service at all, such as welcoming guests and helping them put their luggage in the trunk. It was not until we all got in the car and I was about to close the door that a receptionist hurried over to see us off. I don't care about these points about the housekeeper and the receptionist. I am targeting the people in charge of training and management at Ritz-Carlton. You are Ritz-Carlton, not an ordinary hotel. You have the brand value of a luxury hotel. How are you responsible for training? Catering: I ate both breakfast buffet and dinner buffet in the hotel. I thought that breakfasts in big hotels are similar, but the breakfast at Ritz was perfunctory (the hot and sour soup noodles were really delicious, but there was nothing else to eat), the cut fruits were randomly cut, there was no uniform shape, and the cut watermelon pieces were half the size of my palm. Again, you are Ritz-Carlton, not an ordinary hotel, even the breakfast chef should be careful, and your customer flow is not very large. As for dinner, it was very good. From the ingredients to the degree of care, it was obviously different from breakfast. The fruits were also sliced ‚Äã‚Äãaccording to the shape. It seems that they are not incapable of doing so, but they are not attentive to breakfast. Luxurious atmosphere: The overall red tone of the hotel has a Southeast Asian palace style. The materials used outside the room are all solid wood, which is solid, thick and majestic. The eaves are staggered and unique, but the decoration materials in the room are not so luxurious. The board veneer is not pure solid wood decoration, and the floor tiles in the room are also cheap tiles, which are not upscale (it should be said that the toiletries are very easy to use). In summary!

msg:I stay in hotels on business trips all year round and rarely write reviews. This time I must give a negative review. I arrived at the store around 6 pm on April 30, which was not the peak check-in period. After being guided to the front desk, there were two staff members responsible for checking in. One of the group of guests were foreigners. The check-in process was complicated. After waiting for about seven or eight minutes, I asked How long will it take? The staff told me without expression that it was slow to upload the identity information of foreign customers (no response to the waiting time). After that, the number of customers in the queue gradually increased. Some people complained why there were only two reception staff, so one job was added to queue me up. The people behind me quickly stepped forward to jump in line (the staff ignored them), and then another staff member was added. Finally it was my turn to check in. During check-in, I informed that there were two children who needed two sets of children's toiletries, slippers, pajamas, etc. The staff said that arrangements had been made, and then the housekeeper sent me to the room. He had almost no facial expression except pushing my luggage. After entering the room, I asked if I needed to add a child's bed. Enclosed (twin room), and asked me to confirm whether it was blocked on one side or both sides. I confirmed that it needed to be blocked on both sides. As a result, the children's supplies were not delivered to the room after two hours, and they were delivered after a phone call to urge them. But there is only one side of the fence... As the children and their mother's flight was delayed (we departed from different cities), it was already 11 o'clock when we arrived at the store. After the children packed up and played and went to bed, I found that it was indeed easier for the two children to fall off the bed, so I called for service The center added a barrier and told me that it would be delivered in about 10 minutes later, but there was no response for 20 minutes. I called again to confirm when it would be delivered and was told that it should be soon. After another 10 minutes, I really had no patience and called again to inquire and was informed. Delivered immediately, delivered in a minute. What's even more weird is that a loud broadcast suddenly appeared in the middle of the night: There is a fire in this building, please pay attention to safety, I will kill you. The alarm came again in the morning, and again at 11 o'clock the next night. I was really numb. Because I booked a room on the first floor with direct access to the swimming pool and I have a good psychological quality, but don‚Äôt play with me by always reporting false alarms! Let‚Äôs talk about the toiletries again. For a room that costs more than 4,000 yuan per night, the toiletries are worse than those in a business hotel that costs 500 yuan. The toothbrush is really unbeatable, and the bathroom products are also in large bottles. I have stayed in many hotels in Sanya. The Ritz is a luxury hotel famous for its service. Are you proud of your good business? The service is lackluster, the message connection is confusing, the system is faulty, the facilities and equipment are insufficiently maintained, and the toiletries are cheap. I have been blocked from now on.

msg:When I came to Sanya this time, I first stayed at the Bird's Nest for a few days, and then booked a reservation at the Ritz-Carlton. The hotel front desk came a day in advance to confirm when I would check in, and asked me if I had any special requirements. This is better than the Bird's Nest. It was one or two o'clock in the morning when we arrived at the Bird's Nest, and no one asked us. When checking in at the Ritz-Carlton, the hotel lady gave us a welcome necklace as soon as we got off the bus. We arrived at around 1 p.m., and the room was not cleaned yet. We waited at the front desk for a while, but fortunately we didn‚Äôt wait too long. The kind-hearted housekeeper Iris helped us upgrade to a poolside room. We have traveled a lot and stayed in countless five-star hotels. The service at the Ritz is really good. The room I booked was a hotel package, which included two breakfasts. The guy from the reservation depar**ent confirmed my needs in advance. , I gave my 8-year-old sister a breakfast. There were more than ten bottles of mineral water in the room, and the supply was unlimited. There was no need to ask for it. In fact, a bottle of mineral water doesn't cost much at all, but many hotels can't do this. Other staff in the hotel are also polite, warm and friendly. As soon as you arrive at the beach and poolside, you will be given bath towels and bottled water. There are also sand digging tools on the beach for children to use. My package included free travel photography. The photographer took us for almost an hour to take photos. The photos were good. However, due to time constraints, I did not pay for multiple selections of photos. The staff did not feel unhappy or make a bad face because of this. That's a good point. Miss Iris sends messages from time to time to ask if I need anything, which makes me feel very warm. She also gave the children puzzles and bracelets when checking out. I really enjoyed my stay at the Ritz during this trip. If I have to make some comments, it would be that the breakfast is average. Maybe we have stayed in too many five-star hotels and eaten too many delicious foods. Now we don‚Äôt feel that the breakfast at the Ritz is outstanding. , since in Sanya, they don‚Äôt even provide mangoes among the fruits, and there are no steaks, smoked salmon, cakes and breads that are outstanding and make me want to eat them when I see them. All in all, I hope the breakfast quality can be higher and match the excellent service. In the package, children can feed small animals, beach tents, ropeways, etc., but I didn‚Äôt go to play, so I‚Äôll come back next time!

In fact, the room in the Huahai Pavilion was very far away, and there were so many people there. Although the staff said they could help us take breakfast to the executive building or the room, they felt it was a bit awkward so they were unwilling.
The hotel environment is quite good, the facilities may not be new but they are still usable. I booked two Huahai Pavilion rooms, 3423 and 3426. There is a large heated swimming pool downstairs, which is very convenient, and it is not far from the sea.
The hotel staff are very enthusiastic. We were looking for a children's playground with our two children. We didn't know the way, so a staff member who passed by took us there personally. However, there is really nothing interesting in the children's park. It seems that children over four years old are not interested. They are all small toys. Then there is a constant-temperature children's swimming pool at the entrance of the children's park, which is very shallow. Later, we took our two kids to the heated swimming pool at the beach and they had a lot of fun. Large scarves are provided by the pool, which is very convenient.
The hotel was hosting a wedding, and there was probably a rehearsal late at night. The music was very loud until about ten o'clock, and my two children under the age of three could not sleep. I felt affected.
The beach on the beach is a bit sloped, and the sand is suitable for children to dig in. There are not many people, but there are people on the beach who always want to take pictures for you. They cost 10 yuan each. The photos are not good, so don‚Äôt be fooled. Someone also asked me if I would go catch small crabs at night. He suddenly came over and stood in front of my daughter. My daughter was so frightened that she cried and asked to go back to the room.
Back to the executive lounge, there were a lot of people, and the chocolate that night was so sweet that I panicked. The buffet had relatively few items, but it was still enough to fill me up. But there were too many people, so I wasn‚Äôt happy to renew my reservation, so I stayed for two nights and went to the Mandarin Oriental. However, the hotel sent a seven-seater business car to pick us up. Normally, we would have to call a car to go to other hotels. I asked the housekeeper, and the housekeeper still found a car to take us to another hotel for free. Thank you very much.

I was very happy and shocked to watch them from the balcony.
Location: The hotel is in a very good location. The hotel occupies a large area. If you want to stay in a villa, you have to walk to the hotel and call a battery car. The corresponding beach area is also very large. You can swim in the sea, there is a shark prevention net, and there are many ghosts swimming in the sea.
Service: It feels pretty good and has maintained its due level. Xiao Lin in the lobby was my housekeeper, and he followed me very well. He also helped me book a taxi to go to duty-free, late check-out, etc.

It is recommended to take pictures at 9 o'clock in the morning when the sun is good. There are several check-in spots, including the big lawn in the middle, the big lawn by the sea, and the seaside. The swimming pool is also good, but you need to be able to take pictures. By the way, the hotel allows you to make reservations to play paddle board, so I took a photo of the episode like an internet celebrity.
Facilities: The hotel is well maintained, really grand, and has complete facilities, but I didn‚Äôt have enough time to experience them all. There is a small zoo, but not big, just some chickens, ducks, geese + peacocks.

Points to complain about: First, there are too few swimming pools and the design of the swimming pools is average; second, if there is a wedding at night, it will be very noisy, but it seems that the time will be controlled until 9 p.m.; third, the bathtub does not face the balcony , you can't just take a bath and look at the sea view (the hotel next to it is fine); fourth, you have to charge for the drinks and other things in the refrigerator in the room, which is too stingy. Fifth, the check-in time should be accelerated, and there is often a queue. Sixth, the decoration style. After all, the hotel is a bit old and old (but that doesn't mean the facilities are dilapidated).

We have an 11-month-old baby, and what we are most worried about is the baby's eating and sleeping problems. The hotel provides bed guards and crawling mats. There is also the Ritz Children's Center, which is great. The breakfast chef will ask what we need to prepare for the children. We ask the chef to steam eggs or boil vegetables to add to the porridge every day. For lunch, just leave the hotel and turn right 800 meters away. The small food court can solve the problem, or you can eat the Chinese food in the hotel. I personally don't like the Chinese restaurant in the hotel. It is also possible to go to the Hilton next door to eat Fengyuan Peking duck, and there is also a small hot pot by the sea. These hotels have It feels very good to be able to collude with each other!

name:S‚Äçh‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äçn‚Äçi‚Äçk‚Äçe
info:Family Villa - 1-Room (Pool)
info:Stayed in September 2023
info:Family
info:8 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted September 27, 2023
msg:The last stop of our trip to Sanya, the villa pool room at the Ritz-Carlton, Yalong Bay, is really great! No matter which city you are in, you can always trust Ritz-Carlton!

The service is simply top-notch. The butler Ivan is attentive to every detail. He always responds instantly via WeChat. You can contact him for anything. You can even ask him what kind of flowers and plants fell into the swimming pool~

The skin care products and cosmetics scattered on the dressing table will be placed neatly by the room service staff with small towels, a savior for lazy people! After discovering that we had used the room swimming pool, we specially put a few extra large bath towels when cleaning the room the next day. This sense of service is simply adorable!

There are drinks in the refrigerator, which can be refilled at any time after use. There are bottled water in every corner of the room. Even the sink has taken into account the need to rinse your mouth with clean water after brushing your teeth. There are 9 bottles next to the coffee capsule machine, and even the auxiliary bathroom There is bottled water, hahaha, it feels like the room attendant is really worried!

The flowers in the room are hydrangeas. This hydrangea is not cut off as a whole and inserted into the vase. Instead, the flowers are cut off one by one and inserted into the nutritious mud, so the shape is a perfect spherical shape! Perfect sense of detail!

The small kitchen has an induction cooker, but no tableware is provided. The microwave, refrigerator, and disinfection cabinet are all from Siemens, and the hair dryer is from Braun. Is it time to upgrade the hair dryer to a Dyson?-)
The cold water from the faucet is temperature-controlled, and the water is always warm, which is very considerate, but why doesn't every faucet have a foaming filter? If the water flow is too large, there will be splashing.
Also, the socket on the wall on the right side of the sink is not very stable. There will be poor contact when using the hair dryer. I hope it can be improved.

The towels in the whole room are 98% new, and the toiletries are in large bottles. This really makes me very satisfied, because I hate using small bottles. I just put a large bottle with a pump in the room for easy use. Effortlessly.

The mattress is very soft and very supportive, and it doesn't affect my rest at all even if my family wakes up late at night.

The swimming pool is not big, and the water is not deep, but it is enough for me to ride My Little Pony in the pool. Occasionally, there will be falling flowers and leaves floating on the pool, which is very charming! Since it is an in-room swimming pool, you don‚Äôt have to flee awkwardly back to your room from the public swimming pool when it rains. Instead, you can freely soak in the rain in the swimming pool and wait for it to stop. There is a faucet beside the pool, so you can simply shower and then go to the bathroom to take a shower. , focusing on a leisurely stroll.

The courtyard is not big, but it is small and exquisite. There are fallen plumeria flowers. I picked up a few flowers to decorate the swimming pool beautifully.

Delicious seasonal fruits are delivered every day, and the breakfast is even better. There is a dedicated breakfast room in the villa area, which is different from the breakfast room in the main building. Due to the limitation of the area, there are not so many varieties, but the number of meals is small and refined. If you want Everything can be cooked to order, including eggs Benedict, hot spring eggs, bagels, paired with ham, salami, smoked salmon, etc. The ingredients are fresh and the meal quality is very high!

Dinner was at Runyuan Chinese Restaurant. The food was served a little slow, but the taste was very good. The spicy beef noodles had a large amount of beef. Although the pepper and hemp hairtail was not East China Sea hairtail, it was well seasoned and tasted fresh, fragrant and numb. When you come to Hainan Island, kidney beans must be on the list. As a special vegetable of Hainan, they are stir-fried with XO sauce. The heat is just right. There is still steam when it is served. The texture is crunchy, moist but not astringent. As a Hainanese famous dish, coconut chicken is a must-try. You can smell the fragrance of coconut as soon as it is served. First, try a piece of original chicken breast to verify whether it is free-range chicken. Sure enough, the meat is firm and you can chew it a few more times. fresh! tasty! Eat another piece of old coconut meat. The milky aroma of coconut meat combined with the freshness of Wenchang chicken is a perfect combination!

The two nights at the Ritz came to an end very quickly, but the stamina was very strong. Every minute of the memories made me feel full of happiness!

Goodbye Sanya, goodbye Ritz-Carlton, we will meet again!

I looked at Xiaohongshu for a long time at first. I felt a little worried after seeing some bad reviews, but after arriving at the hotel, all kinds of worries began to gradually disappear~
First of all, there is no butler service and guardian angel as said on the Internet. I don‚Äôt know why, but I have it anyway. I received a call from Li Zi the day before the trip, asking about my estimated arrival time, and then arranged for the guardian angel to add WeChat. Here I would like to praise my guardian angel, Miss Maggie! Very patient, super good attitude, any needs can be met in every possible way! This is why Li Zi‚Äôs price is there, hahaha (more on that later)
After arriving at the hotel, I received a string of shell necklaces at the door. The attitude was very good throughout the check-in process. Because of the Ctrip membership rights, I was upgraded from the Lihai Pavilion Sea View Room to the Litian Pavilion Sea View Room for free. It is said that the floor is higher and has a better sea view. Although we had to wait until 4:30 to enter the hotel after checking in, Maggie was very patient and comforted us. We had a group-buy afternoon tea in the lobby bar. I was a little surprised that Lizi also offered group purchases at a civilian price. The waiter was Nico, and his attitude was also very good.
Every day, someone would come in to clean the room and change towels after we went out, and they had a good sense of propriety. They would not touch your personal belongings, but they would tidy up the hotel's things.
Fruits were delivered every day. On the last day, I said I wanted to drink coconut milk, which was not delivered originally. Maggie also helped me get two coconut milk. It's really versatile!
The only disadvantage: the beach is really not good after filling with sand. There are many shells and stones. In fact, you can't go out too deep. There are big stones blocking the way, and it's hard to swim out.
I suggest you take a taxi to Seaside World, which is 2 kilometers away. The beach there is super beautiful! It can be called the world's first bay!
I think the advantage of Chestnut is that it makes you feel like you have entered a private and quiet environment away from the world, so you can enjoy the feeling of vacation. The only time I feel that there are more people in the whole hotel is during the buffet breakfast. At other times, the hotel feels that there are not many people. The place is large, the swimming pool is also large, and everywhere gives people a sense of quiet and private comfort (for example, the last two pictures, the infinity pool at 11 o'clock in the morning, is definitely not like other Internet celebrity hotels where a bunch of people are posing for photos. There are only two or three people in the whole swimming pool. There are almost no people on the beach)
Finally, my biggest feeling is that the people who live in Chestnut are really rich people who come for vacation naturally üòÇ Everyone is very educated. There are no Internet celebrities or tourists who take crazy photos (I don‚Äôt mean discrimination here, I‚Äôm just telling the truth. Maybe I am the tourist who wants to **)
The price is there, and there will definitely be a lot of people who nitpick and blacken it, but I ask myself that I have high requirements for hotels. I am still very satisfied with this stay! Those who want to stay can go ahead with confidence!

The waiter cleans very clean every day. It can be seen from the details that he is meticulous and serious. In the time it takes to have breakfast, the room is cleaned, daily necessities are placed neatly, the clothes on the bed are neatly stacked, and all kinds of threads are smoothed. Okay, the shoes are also arranged and put away. The towel can be folded into a swan or an elephant. I really want to stay a few more days to see what new tricks it can come up with!
The breakfast is very rich and varied. After eating it for three days in a row, you won't feel tired. The main reason is that it tastes very good. Compared with the breakfast in a certain hotel later, it can be said that it is Marriott's food, which is full of color, flavor and taste. The kitchen team that can set up Egg Benedict as a buffet is definitely the best! And that bowl of beef noodles, the combination of hot and sour taste is really amazing, otherwise the queue at the noodle stall would not be free every morning.
The environment is not bad, there is rich greenery, the swimming pool is divided into several, each with its own characteristics, the water is very clean, there are plenty of lounge chairs, there are parasols on the shore, and the scenery is very good.
The complimentary travel photography is also very efficient, the photo editing effect is good, and the service is also very good.
What is worth mentioning is the service of this hotel. There is nothing wrong with it. Lawrence, our guest relations service specialist, is also very good. He has strong service awareness, high efficiency and professional manners. From contacting the day before check-in to check-out, he helps solve many problems every day. There is also Nichole at the restaurant. On the first day, she made a cup of coffee for my husband and brought it to his seat. The next day, she made the same cup of coffee for my husband and placed it on his seat. Nichole would even ask me, "Mr., is the coffee today different from yesterday's?" It‚Äôs too much, there‚Äôs too much milk, do I need to add more coffee for my husband?‚Äù I was shocked, and I asked her, how do you remember the difference in the coffee of the same person during breakfast time for so many people? ! No matter how she answered me, I admire this girl!
In the following days, my husband and I often discussed the services of the two hotels, and RC was superior. We have even started planning to only book hotels in RC for our next stay in Sanya. The environment is good and the dining is not crowded. Even if we take care of our children, we don't want to dine in a small restaurant with so many families with children. Every waiter we met in the hotel made us feel that they have a strong sense of service and are willing to serve guests from the bottom of their hearts. The waiters who provide directions for breakfast will also enthusiastically guide the direction of the restaurant, say hello with a smile, and greet the children cordially. This is the a**osphere created by a hotel's culture, and this is how a hotel can be recognized for a long time!
I like this hotel very much and hope the business of Ritz will get better and better!

msg:This time I stayed in two hotels in Sanya, namely the Park Hyatt in Sun Bay and the Ritz-Carlton in Yalong Bay. I stayed at the Ritz for a company group tour last year and had a very good impression, so I chose the Ritz again for this trip with my parents. Lina from the executive lounge called the day before check-in to confirm the itinerary and ask if there were any needs. I booked an executive suite at Huahaixuan. I mentioned to Lina that I wanted to celebrate the old lady's 70th birthday and hoped to arrange a high floor and birthday decorations. Unexpectedly, Lina gave us a surprise when we checked in the next day. She upgraded us directly to a two-bedroom executive sea view suite in Huatianxuan. It is said that there are only two rooms of this type in the entire hotel, and ours is on the floor of the executive lounge. Next, it is very convenient to dine in the lounge. Lina also arranged to decorate the room for her birthday and gave her a little lion. The privileges in the executive lounge are very good. You can eat five meals a day from morning to night, and you can also drink refreshing tea in the afternoon. It is worth mentioning that the breakfast at the Ritz is probably the best among the hotels in Sanya. It has many varieties and tastes good, especially the hot and sour beef noodles. There is a long queue every morning. It is better than the breakfast at the Park Hyatt where I stayed before. So much better. The hotel staff we came into contact with during our stay, whether in the executive lounge, gym or poolside, were very polite and took the initiative to say hello. When we strolled to the poolside (not planning to go swimming), the staff even took the initiative to give us With bottled drinking water, you can feel their sincere sense of service. JAY also provided various assistance during our stay. Since our return flight was in the evening, the hotel generously extended our flight to 4 pm and arranged a special car to send us to the airport. When we checked out, a supervisor lady whose name I didn't remember gave us a souvenir. Of course, the Ritz also has its own shortcomings. After all, the hotel is old, the facilities are a bit outdated, some cabinet doors in the room cannot be closed tightly, and the hardware is slightly inferior to newer hotels such as the Park Hyatt. But in general, the faults outweigh the faults. As the number one hotel in Yalong Bay, the Ritz-Carlton Sanya is a good hotel and worth recommending. I would also like to sincerely thank LINA, JAY and other staff for their meticulous service during their stay.

msg:It was my first time to come to Sanya after the epidemic. On Friday night, I suddenly wanted to see the sea.
Yes, I booked a ticket, a hotel, and an airport pick-up late at night. It was a short trip that I just wanted to go on. I didn't go to Haitang Bay because I wanted to see the sea. I chose between several five-star hotels. I haven't stayed at the Carlton Hotel before. I booked it after seeing the good reviews. It's really cool to go to Sanya in September. It's cool in the morning and evening, and it's not too hot at noon as long as you're not under the sun.

 Environment: If you want to see the sea, you should live in Yalong Bay. You can see the sea in the sea view room you choose (Picture 2, 5). After breakfast (Picture 3), you will lie on a chair on the exclusive beach at noon, looking at the sea (Picture 8). Drinking ice-cold coconut juice, listening to music, just wishing that time could stand still.
Facilities: swimming pool, cinema, 4 restaurants
Hygiene: Don‚Äôt worry about the hygiene of a five-star hotel, it‚Äôs very clean.
  Food: Stayed for 2 nights and went to 2 restaurants respectively.
       Breakfast: There are many kinds of breakfast, and the beef noodles are the most delicious. I ate 2 bowls (Picture 2)
       Buffet barbecue dinner: only available from Thursday to Saturday. There is a resident singer, and the female singer sings better. The quality of the dishes is very good and there are many varieties, including lobster, foie gras, abalone, steak, lamb chops, meat skewers, etc., and unlimited wine. (Figure 7)
     Seaside Steakhouse: You can directly see the sea, you can order a la carte if you have a set meal, the cocktails are delicious, the dishes are delicious, and there are also resident singers, which is better than the indoor one. (Figure 8)
     
   Service: I want to focus on the service. I have been to Sanya many times and the five-star hotel I have stayed in is the one with the best service. Overall, I feel that the service provided by female staff is better. In particular, I would like to praise the service staff of the two restaurants.
     1. I ate a buffet barbecue dinner on the first day, and my legs were red from playing water sports. I needed iodophor. I told the service staff that I was very enthusiastic and went to the infirmary to find us iodophor. My name is *Qingjiang. Sorry for forgetting my last name. What's up?
     2. The next day I had dinner at a seaside steakhouse. I wanted to order a cocktail, but I didn‚Äôt know how it tasted. The service staff said that I could taste it first, and change it if I didn‚Äôt like it. I thought the Wellington steak was not grilled to my taste. I baked new ones, and the chef and store manager personally explained it. They also sent salads and desserts. I was so moved. It was too dark and I couldn‚Äôt see the badge clearly. The two waitresses, the store manager, and the chef were all very nice. Thank you againüòä
      3. When lying down on the beach at the seaside, the service staff brought water, ice towels, and helped lift the lounge chair to avoid the sun.
       4. When I checked in, I found that the balcony fence was made of cement and blocked the view. The housekeeper was very helpful and contacted the front desk.
    
       Reminder: 1. In Sanya T1 Terminal, when picking up the airport, be sure not to let the driver wait in the parking lot. It will be so congested that the car will not be able to get out at all.
        2. For water sports at the beach, you can ask the hotel concierge staff for recommendations. You can get discounts and don‚Äôt worry about being ripped off.
        Regrets: 1. Because I booked a hotel late at night, I didn‚Äôt see clearly and booked a twin room, so Ctrip gave me a room upgrade. The hotel upgraded the floor, but the king bed room was said to be no longer available, so I had to accept it. Later, I saw on Ctrip that there were still king bed rooms. However, it should be noted that some of the balcony fences of its sea-view rooms are made of cement. You need to stand up to see the sea, and the tables and chairs are useless. It is emphasized that the balcony fence should have railings.
     2. Except for the first two times I came to Sanya to eat out, I have always eaten in hotels since then, so I have never encountered any situations such as carrying passengers. I guess many people like us like to eat in hotels. However, the overall price of its food and beverages is high. When eating dinner on the first day, there were very few people. I thought it was because there were few people staying in the off-season. When I had breakfast the next day, there were not many people at all. Thinking about it, the price of the buffet table is too high, 698 yuan per person. I took a look at Dianping. The prices of other hotels around are between 298 and 398. Of course, the quality of the food is definitely better, but the price is indeed a bit high. If you stay for a few days, you will spend a lot of money on meals. money. It is recommended that the store offer additional promotions and reduce the price appropriately for guests who dine at the hotel continuously.
      3. When booking the hotel, I saw that there were many activities in the hotel, and some projects were given as gifts, but they were of average practicality and I did not participate in any of them. For example, if paddle boarding activities are arranged in the afternoon when the sun is very sunny, it is prohibitive. If it is done in the early morning or evening, the effect will be better. Of course, if you are bringing children, you can participate more.
       I have written a lot and said a lot. It is a very good hotel and everyone can stay at ease.

Before coming to Sanya, I read the reviews and people always praised the rich and delicious breakfast and the excellent service. I really chose the right one~
It is very suitable for a leisurely vacation in the hotel ~ the swimming pool and the hotel's private beach, the hot towels that have just been sterilized are delivered by a special person, and the large coconut grove lawn is very good, which is much better than the Internet celebrity attraction "Coconut Tree Promenade", because there is no such thing here mosquito.
Although the green coverage rate of the hotel is quite high, I haven't been bitten once after staying for two days. The disinfection work is super in place, and I can rest assured to walk on the lawn path at night ~ playing light and melodious light music is very Chill~~
As for some people commenting that the facilities are old, I personally think that this is the style of old money...the kind with a deep foundation. At least there is no abnormal noise like the air conditioner in the same five-star hotel in Sanya Bay, and the maintenance of equipment like the Ritz is still in place. The decoration is more in line with my mother's Chinese aesthetics. After all, the star hotels on the seaside of Yalong Bay are old hotels that have been open for a long time...
So don‚Äôt choose online celebrity shops, only look for the Ritz brand hahahaha

Key Ps: 1. The scenery by the pool is the most impressive when the lights are on. There is also a large green plant landscape in front of the swimming pool, which is also a place for supermodel Liu Wen to take pictures~~ Go beyond the film on a sunny day

2. Go early for breakfast. After all, it ends at 11:00. We once had too many people after 9:00, and the queue was so noisy that we lost the dining experience.

3. Don‚Äôt worry about the styling suggestions given by the photographer when you‚Äôre taking photos‚Ä¶ because he doesn‚Äôt respect your personal wishes and takes a lot of photos for you only because of the P-picture effect (snake essence face ten-level skin care), and Bojue doesn‚Äôt give you original photos. The picture is just a quick retouching photo made for Ai, a piece of 80, don't make a big mistake, the 15-second video is purely just a task, just run around the lawn and the beach, it's done, it's not aesthetically pleasing, please don't add too much Much money is expected. I hope you don't encounter a photographer with a bad attitude like me, so you have a weak impression of Liz~

4. It takes only ten minutes to reach Baihuagu Square. The local specialty Taiqiong Seafood Hot Pot is super delicious. You don‚Äôt have to worry about anything.

5. Do not go to the food stalls where seafood is slaughtered. The taste is bad and expensive. Go to seafood market/wanghao supermarket, buy and process

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Premier Ocean View Room Double Double
info:Stayed in June 2023
info:Family
info:3 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted June 11, 2023
msg:The overall experience of the Ritz-Carlton, which has been struggling for a long time to choose, is still very good. The hotel environment is more elegant and tidy. There is no water park but there are some activities that children can participate in, such as paddle board, bubble party, crab catching and so on. Except for paddle board, other activities are relatively naive for older children like us, and they are more suitable for small babies. I also hope that the hotel can add more activities for teenagers. The hotel's beach is quieter and less crowded because it is closer to the side. There are too many stones on the beach, and it may hurt your feet to go into the sea without shoes. The waves are relatively large these days, and there are not many people swimming. The quality of sea water and beaches is much better than that of Sanya Bay.
Accommodation: The room is spacious. The full sea view room we booked has a good view, and the bed is very comfortable. There is a bathtub, shower room, washbasin and toilet separately, which is very good. The downside is that because the climate in Sanya is hot and humid, clothes and swimsuits cannot be dried even after washing. The hotel does not provide free drying services, which is a bit inconvenient.
Diet: The hotel has three or four restaurants, including Chinese food, Italian restaurant, Western food, and seaside barbecue. Our room included a buffet breakfast, which was very good in the morning, with plenty of variety and good taste. Fruits are not very abundant. We ate Chinese food and Italian food in the hotel. The food tastes good, but it is expensive. Including the buffet breakfast, if it is not included, the ** price will be more than 200 per person. Overall meal prices are high.
Service: Our housekeeper is called Sherry, I like it üëç, the service is very considerate, the reply is timely, and the problem is solved quickly. I sprained my foot by the pool while swimming. After talking to Sherry, I asked a colleague to give me Yunnan Baiyao aerosol. I returned to visit and greeted me the next day, which was very heartwarming.
In short, the hotel is worth recommending for the first trip to Sanyaüåπ

A warm reminder to other tourists: this temperature is more suitable for swimming in the afternoon (except for the constant temperature pool). If you want to swim in other pools except the constant temperature pool in the afternoon, it is best to go to the constant temperature pool to adapt to the water temperature and swim for a while before going to other pools. Otherwise, the water will be a bit cold, and you will catch a cold easily when blown by the wind, or you can just flush yourself with cold water.

Facilities: The hotel has 400+ rooms and has been built for more than 10 years. Although it has been newly renovated, there are still traces of time, which cannot be avoided, but the good thing about Ritz is that these facilities have been well maintained, so that you can only pay attention to the decoration style. Inherent impression, rather than as a defect. For example, the TV in the bathing area is an LCD TV hidden in the mirror. The sliding doors are very slippery. The only thing that can be improved is the Philips hair dryer, which is not to say that it is not good, but it is indeed an old household style.


Hygiene: The sanitation of the room and the interior of the hotel is well maintained. The daily cleaning is basically in the middle of the afternoon. The waiter will greet you with a friendly smile, tidy up your mobile phone charger, re-pave the bedding and supplies, etc. Wait, be very careful.

Environment: The entrance of Ritz is very big, it is halfway up the mountain, through the Chinese-style building is the lawn and the beach, you will get a map when you check in, carefully observe that the housing is spread out on both sides of the hall, a total of four buildings, and on the left is In the villa area, the first floor is a restaurant, a spa, and a children's playground. In addition to the noisy room full of people on the day of check-in, the entire hotel is very quiet, and people are basically concentrated in the heated swimming pool, beach, and children's center. If you like quietness, you can choose Ritz. Other hotels in Biarong Bay will be much quieter and more slow-lived. In fact, if you look from the beach, you will find that there are relatively few people on the beach at the Ritz. The further you go to the Hilton, etc., the seaside of their hotel is overcrowded with vacationers.

Ritz‚Äôs service is saturated, especially the housekeeper sister. The power to bring all of the above back to the front. After I fed back the problems I encountered to star, she made improvements in a way that turned the tide. I can‚Äôt say more about the specific service content. Swimming pool: There is a children's heated swimming pool and an outdoor infinity heated swimming pool, but they are basically played by children and are more friendly to children. There is also a central large swimming pool. When the weather is good, some people are swimming, and you can also experience paddle boarding.
Catering: The seaside BBQ on the first night, because the wind was too strong, so the experience of eating was mediocre, it was too cold, 798 per person, if the weather is good, the price is actually worth it, there are a lot of things and it is very good. The Chinese restaurant is the most comfortable and cost-effective meal I have eaten in Sanya for four days. Four adults and one baby cost more than 1,000 yuan. The dishes are all delicious. The Italian restaurant is pretty good. There are four big ones and one small one, and it costs more than 2,700 yuan. It is normal for Western food to be more expensive than Chinese food. Pizza is the most cost-effective staple food, and it is baked in an oven. The breakfast is very rich and the quality is guaranteed. My mother ate it for three days without repeating it, and she still hasn't eaten all of it.
Children: There is a children's heated swimming pool and a children's paradise. There are many toys in it. Every restaurant has children's meals. The room can provide bedsides. As soon as you enter the hotel, children are given painting gifts. In short, they are relatively friendly to children.
Services: Restaurants, swimming pools, children's paradise, lobby, concierge depar**ent, there are many service personnel in various places, so the service can keep up, and there is a butler service, which is very convenient. Our butler is della, basically all of us She helped us with all ideas and reservations, and we are very satisfied with it!

name:G‚Äçl‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçu‚Äç7‚Äç9
info:Deluxe Room Double Double

posted:Posted January 28, 2023
msg:I struggled for a long time on whether I should write this review or not. Until last night, I told myself that the hotel is too busy after the Chinese New Year, and it is not easy. I am afraid that it will have a bad influence on you! However, when I returned to the hotel from outside at ten o'clock in the evening and opened the door, I was surprised. I hope this review will help you improve your hotel services and bring a better experience to future guests.
From the beginning, a family of four plans to come to Sanya to welcome the New Year, three days at Atlantis, three days at Ritz-Carlton, maybe because I lived in Atlantis first, I felt the lack of services at Ritz-Carlton Bar! The reason for this comparison is that two hotels were booked at almost the same price, both of which are around 6,000 yuan per night. The following points are compared from the following points, so that we can see the problem better: 1. When you arrive at the entrance of the Atlantis Hotel, there are six or seven doormen who will help you open the door and carry your luggage.
When we arrived at the entrance of the Ritz-Carlton Hotel, it was about 7:30 in the evening. There were two female doormen there. We were too weak to help us open the door and get our luggage. We took it ourselves.
2. Go to the front desk to check in, the service butler confirms the check-in, and directly informs the cleaning staff to prepare the children's slippers and bathrobes and deliver them to the room. The speed is very fast.
In the Ritz-Carlton Hotel, the housekeeper did not provide related items and services for children, which also led to subsequent service problems.
 3. The butler of Atlantis took us to the room and told us that all the drinks and food in the refrigerator are free, unlimited, and will be filled up the next day, as well as free afternoon tea, light meals and happy hour for dinner, free tickets to the water world, The aquarium is free, even after twelve o'clock in the evening, any questions will be answered in seconds, and the service is in place, including how to arrange to go to the water world, what things need to be brought, and meticulous.
The Ritz-Carlton butler took us into the room and told us about the charges for food such as French fries and Evian water in the refrigerator (this is also the question I am most confused about. We live in a room of 6,000 yuan per night, and a box of French fries costs 3 yuan. I really don‚Äôt understand the charges! Is it the guests who are short of the few dollars or your hotel is short of the few dollars? I feel very upset.) The follow-up housekeeper also briefly introduced the corresponding hotel-related services and the location of the restaurant. Ritz Carl The location of Dayton Hotel is still very good, with relatively large floor space and relatively quiet. I think this is the biggest advantage of your hotel. From the perspective of added value, there is no way to compare with Atlantis. The house price, your added value is too low, and there are almost no valuable additional services!
 4. This also made me very dissatisfied. I went to the beach the next morning and found that there were no children's sandals in the room, so I asked the housekeeper to bring the children's sandals. After waiting for about 17-18 minutes, I still didn't send them. Come on, the kids couldn‚Äôt wait any longer, we finally went to the beach in cloth dragging (there were urgings during the process, I thought this might be an accident at the time, please give me your understanding!), and went to the swimming pool at 2:30 in the afternoon to swim and found There are no children wearing bathrobes, and I asked the housekeeper to bring children‚Äôs bathrobes. After 2-3 reminders, it took 21 minutes to deliver them. I really don‚Äôt understand: your waiter‚Äôs time is more important than the customer‚Äôs time. There is another mention on the surface, what is shown is your arrogance or the lack of service management! Another thing that happened on this day was that the cleaning staff came to clean up and did not change the sheets!
5. Checked in on the third day, had breakfast in the morning and went to the city to play, left the room at about 09:30 in the morning, and returned to the room at 10:00 in the evening, and found that the scene was the same as when we left in the morning, the sanitation was not cleaned, the bed was not made, There is no drinking mineral water in the room, as evidenced by the attached picture! At this time, I was a little bit over the top. Considering that I really didn‚Äôt want to get angry during the Chinese New Year, I endured it and asked them to bring mineral water. The room was not cleaned, let alone the sheets. It was too late, wash and sleep Bar!
6. With regard to safety, the beach in Atlantis is guarded when you enter and leave the beach. You can only enter and exit after verifying your identity. The door of your hotel to the beach is not guarded. You can enter and exit at will. Even outsiders can enter the hotel.
7. About breakfast, go to have breakfast from 9:30 to 10:00. This is the peak period, and guests have to wait in line. It can‚Äôt accommodate so many guests, and they have to wait for more than ten minutes. In your eyes, the time for guests is Not precious! You are not customer centric! There are also points worthy of praise here (the service of the waiters in the breakfast room is still very good, responsive, quick response, service attitude is very good, and the hot and sour beef noodles are very good!)

Maybe the housekeeper felt that the service was not good in the past two days, so he sent two lion dolls to the children. We stayed at your hotel to have fun and celebrate the Spring Festival. It can be said that we stayed at your hotel for three days and felt very uncomfortable. It affects my mood very much, and I have been controlling my emotions. Until we left the store and returned, we did not receive a "goodbye" from your housekeeper. At the same time, I am also very surprised why your rating on Ctrip is so high! ? I feel like I was cheated by this rating!

It's still the classic saying: "No comparison, no harm", with almost the same house price, I spent every day happily in Atlantis, but at Ritz-Carlton I feel like I live in a five-star hardware service Samsung's Great hotel, this is the real feeling!
The above content is a real fact, without any fabrication or slander, all written based on fact comparison, I am responsible for the above written content! This evaluation is a bit long, I hope this evaluation can inspire you, improve your service quality in the future, and provide customers with satisfactory services!

name:J‚Äçu‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçu‚Äçs‚Äç_‚ÄçZ
info:Premier Ocean View Room King
info:Stayed in December 2022
info:Couples
info:7 Reviews
rating:4
posted:Posted January 1, 2023
msg:Most of the hotels in Sanya have the following three common problems: first, affected by factors such as climate, frequency of use and maintenance level, the hotel will age quickly after opening; second, the consistency of service level is not high, Even the top luxury hotels may be stuck at a specific time and in a specific aspect; third, there are a lot of tourists in peak seasons, and there are many children. For example, on New Year's Day in 2023, almost all hotels in Yalong Bay and Haitang Bay are full.

In the context of the above, I would like to call the Ritz-Carlton, Yalong Bay "the goalkeeper of the top luxury hotel in Sanya". Currently in Sanya, only Capella, Edison and Park Hyatt can surpass the Ritz-Carlton in terms of overall quality and living experience.

The following is the specific living experience:

First, hardware maintenance is in place. Most of the rooms have been refurbished in recent years and don't look old. However, the aging of the public area and room doors and door locks is more obvious.
Second, the service level is still solid, and there are basically no pitfalls, but don't expect too much.
Third, the catering is quite satisfactory.
Fourth, there are a lot of tourists in peak season. Because even in the peak season, the house price of this Ritz-Carlton will be about 1000~2000 yuan lower than that of Capella, Edition and Park Hyatt, and the cost performance is outstanding, so many people will choose to come here for vacation.

Therefore, the Ritz-Carlton in Yalong Bay is a choice that can hardly make mistakes and is cost-effective.

I was instantly amazed. It is very rare to have such an attentive waiter who would specially bake a bar that does not serve pizza to satisfy my cravings. When Nikita brought me the pizza made by Master Hong in the lounge , Fragrant and soft, full of cheese, a veritable love pizza, here I really want to thank Nikita for taking care of me throughout this trip, and then one day my mother and I didn't want to go downstairs for afternoon tea, she also I specially delivered the cake set to the room, and added the special Hainanese snack "Qingbuliang" made by their lounge that day, which made me sweet in my heart
The staff of this hotel really provide meticulous service. If you travel to Sanya in the future, you must only stay at the Ritz


‚ÄãIn fact, this hotel has details, not just one or two waiters who are very attentive, but every waiter is very polite and enthusiastic no matter where they go. One can imagine the difficulties of the tourism industry under the epidemic, but at this moment Thoughtful and meticulous service is the embodiment of the soft power of the hotel. Thank you to everyone who made me feel good times

name:S‚Äçw‚Äça‚Äçg‚Äçg‚Äçy‚Äç$
info:Deluxe Room King

info:Solo travelers
info:2 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted June 2, 2022
msg:To conclude, the Jinmao Ritz-Carlton is the most cost-effective hotel for my one-month trip to Hainan in Sanya.

üöó The hotel is located on the west side of Yalong Bay. Since I came back from other hotels in Yalong Bay, I used walking. Of course, I underestimated the weather in Sanya. I was sweating in just ten minutes, but when I entered the hotel lobby, the concierge I didn't turn a blind eye like other hotels, but ran over to help me with my luggage, and I received a shell necklace first when I entered the door, which was very ceremonial.

This time I received üíÅNicole Yunni. When I checked in in the lobby, I asked if I wanted a drink, and seeing that I was sweating, I took the initiative to take a tissue. Because it was a titanium card, the hotel gave a swimming pool cover, and also provided a room to rest before the room was cleaned up.

The style of the room is new Chinese style, maybe this is not as popular as the Internet celebrity Autograph Collection, but the luxury of soft clothing is not comparable to that of Autograph Collection, which is why Jinmao Ritz-Carl At present (2022.5-6), the price of the hotel is 300 higher than that of Autograph Collection. On the contrary, it is more cost-effective, because compared with other hotels, the Jinmao Ritz-Carlton is basically crushed in all directions.

When I went swimming in the swimming pool, Yunni gave me a welcome gift from the hotel. After asking my location, she sent it directly to the swimming pool. The "not lazy" service seemed easy, but in fact, it was rare in the hotels I stayed in. On the contrary, such services can be seen everywhere at the Jinmao Ritz-Carlton in Sanya, including asking me whether I need nucleic acid to go to the high-speed rail station in the evening. This is the off-duty time, and she can not take the initiative to ask me for help. It is very intimate, and the Ritz also wants to be warmer than other hotels.

There are still many cases of service. For example, I just glanced at the Indian brother (probably) for breakfast, and he understood that I had a need and ran over. It was my 12th day at Autograph Collection that I gave my room number exactly.

Ritz's service is the most praiseworthy, not only very diligent but also very smart.

Regarding the facilities, the swimming pool is the cleanest in the hotel I stayed in. The width of the swimming pool is about 50m, which can basically be seen at a glance. The water temperature is also a very intimate 32 degrees. I know that 32 degrees is not the best water temperature for swimming competitions, but for For a resort hotel, it is competitive that no one goes to the swimming pool. Being able to go to the swimming pool in seconds is the first demand for swimming at the beach. I hope that all resort hotels across the country will be unified.

The villa area by the sea makes me feel the feeling of being in Los Angeles, maybe in the same Yalong Bay coastline, but I am very responsible to say that in different hotels you feel different scenery.

On the downside, I want to say that the breakfast every day is not led, so I also missed the ice latte, which is available every day at Autograph Collection, and the semi-buffet breakfast is also not asked. Do I need a single order (asked when I was about to receive the meal), I almost missed the single order when I went there for the first time, and the quality of the breakfast was almost meaningless. How many gaps are there between other hotels, the fruit is a fruit plate, but the content is also ordinary, which is a disadvantage compared with the Waldorf Astoria Shanghai on the Bund, which has a similar brand positioning and price, and is below the expected value.

Of course, the breakfast + evening package recently sold by Jinmao Ritz-Carlton is the most cost-effective option. After all, there is nothing delicious in Yalong Bay. You even have to choose McDonald's and Haidilao outside. Faced with this dilemma, this package is actually a great solution.

Sanya at sunset is already beautiful and delicious. At this time, a matching dinner is needed to implement this memory on the tip of the tongue and lips, and the seaside restaurant can completely make you forget the regional positioning of Sanya's food desert.

Lin Yutang once said that the feast of life is in front of us, and the only question now is what our appetite is.

msg:After more than half a year, I returned to the familiar Sanya Ritz again. Of course, the first choice for parents and children is the full-day administrative meal package.

The stay coincided with the small peak of the epidemic in Hainan, and Ritz was not alone, and most of the employees fell ill. In this special period, I can only praise again and again that "it is worthy of being the top brand", and I have really done my best!

Avril and Nikita in the executive lounge went out of their way to give us the best service possible. On the first day of check-in, Nikita told the truth that because too many employees fell ill, the room cleaning may not be timely, and provided compensation meal coupons, Nice call! During the follow-up stay, in fact, the room attendants basically responded in a timely manner. When only one-third of the staff arrived and the occupancy rate was over 90%, the Ritz staff really worked hard. I would like to express my heartfelt thanks grateful!

Last weekend was the online exam day for children. The exam started at 8:00 in the morning, and the exam papers needed to be printed on the spot. I was worried because the executive lounge was closed in the morning, but Avril and Nikita kindly helped me print out the test papers and send them to the room at 8:00 every morning. Therefore, the exam went smoothly, and I would like to thank you two for your support throughout the process!

At the same time, I would like to express my gratitude to Ms. Liu Xiaoyan of the room service. She is on duty every day, and the command is crisp and neat, and the cleaning is fast and serious. Praise!

During the special period, I still enjoyed the outstanding thoughtful and caring service of Sanya Ritz. I wrote this review on the last day of 2022 to pay tribute to all the staff in the hotel industry who have been very, very difficult in the past three years!

msg:Generally speaking, it is very good. This time I stayed in the Litian Pavilion room type. The view angle of the sea view on the top floor is positive.
1. Service (5 points)
Because it is indeed a holiday, there are many people, so there is no point deduction. The response speed of the Room service is fast, and the arrangement of the night bed and the replacement of spare towels are also very timely, mainly because the attitude is very good and polite.
2. Room type (4.5 points)
Because it belongs to the hotel in this row of Yalong Bay, although the maintenance is good, it is still a little old. If you mind, you may choose those Internet celebrity hotels. The double bed is standard 1.2, and the bedding is very comfortable. It is a Marriott The comfort is close to the ceiling.
3. Hotel Activities (4.5 points)
It happens to be an event with rizt kids, both adults and children can participate. The gifts in exchange include rizt lion dolls. The participation rate is very high and it is very close to the people. It is suitable for parent-child groups. , It's easy to get tired with a baby, and it's another matter with an aunt.
4. Swimming pool (4.5 points)
There is only one public swimming pool (seemingly), which is shared with the poolside room. Compared with the swimming pools in the Yalong Bay hotels, the area is not very large (but at least it is larger than you, you say, Meimei), and there are not many people swimming. At the same time, there are paddle boards and equipment for rent. The pool temperature is slightly cooler and very comfortable. In comparison, the swimming pool here is a paradise. The swimming pools of several nearby hotels are dumplings.

Generally speaking, if you want to go to the sea to watch the sea bubble hotel in a daze, it should be very good to live in Yalong Bay and choose rizt, and give it a 4.6 points.

name:M‚ÄçO‚ÄçN‚ÄçV‚ÄçI‚ÄçC
info:Deluxe Room Double Double
info:Stayed in March 2022
info:Couples
info:6 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted March 17, 2022
msg:Taking advantage of the fact that it is not too hot in Sanya in March, come to Yalong Bay to enjoy the baptism of the sun and the beach. This time, I chose to stay at the Ritz-Carlton. After moving in, all I can say is that this little lion is so stable, the four days here can be described as almost perfect and enjoyable.
1Ô∏è‚É£ Environment
The design of The Ritz-Carlton, Yalong Bay is inspired by the Summer Palace's maritime palace, and the pavilion buildings are scattered and magnificent. The swimming pool is very new, and it is also the most satisfying place to stay this time, and the pool water is clear and clean. I haven't seen a leaf in the swimming pool for four days. The large open area and lawn allow guests to sit or even lie down to enjoy the sunshine in Sanya at any time.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Service
In one word, it is: considerate and measured. After checking in, there will be a private service butler who will add the resident's WeChat account. During this period, basically all needs are responsive. One day I went to the public beach and got scratched. When I came back to contact the butler, I immediately sent Band-Aids and hydrogen peroxide. All employees will take the initiative to say hello when they call the guests, and they are enthusiastic from the heart, and the experience is excellent. There are many other small details. For example, as soon as the sun loungers are seated by the pool, the service staff will immediately bring towels, and there is also an unlimited free trial of sunscreen by the pool. In short, basically all needs are thought of for the guests in advance.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Dining
The hotel's food and beverage types are quite rich. There are different restaurants for Western food and Chinese food. I personally like the sea, so I had lunch and dinner in the hotel's seaside restaurant. The most important thing is convenience, you can leave the hotel all day and relax in the hotel completely.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Summary
The service level of this little lion in Ritz-Carlton has always been online. If you have a sufficient budget, you can come here. It is the highest quality resort hotel on the coast of Yalong Bay, no one. Many things are not clear in words, and can only be experienced by yourself. In short, I will recommend my friends to come here. If I come to Yalong Bay in Sanya next time, I will definitely go straight to stay here, and I will not consider other hotels at all.

msg:This is the most amazing hotel I have ever stayed in in Sanya, bar none. That's right, Jinmao Sanya Yalong Bay Ritz-Carlton. The last time I came with her, this time I wanted to relive the feeling of that year.

The room is very comfortable, the bedding is clean and tidy, the cleaning aunt cleans twice a day, and the request can be met at any time. The little conch that comes with every day is very cute. The words on the service card are also very beautiful, and they look beautiful, and they do not lose the luxury of a top luxury brand.

Ritz's breakfast is great, she liked it back then, and this time it continues to maintain a high level, the taste and color are all ok. It's just that there are relatively few hot dishes for breakfast, and it can continue to be improved. The lunch at the seaside restaurant is very good, the western food is exquisite and excellent, and the chef's level of sauce is worth tasting.

The constant temperature swimming pool is maintained at 29 degrees. After the sun is over at noon, the temperature is higher in the afternoon, which is suitable for diving. The infinity pool is very beautiful, and you can easily find a beautiful angle. The water quality of several other swimming pools is ok, but it is not constant temperature. It is a little cold in the morning and evening in this season.

Finally, a small suggestion:
It is recommended to increase the charging piles in the parking lot to facilitate the charging of electric vehicles.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton, a choice you won't be disappointed with.

The biggest problem is that the swimming pool with balcony access is 1.2 meters deep, and there is no fence, and it will fall if you are not careful. It's much better to change to a room with a jacuzzi, at least you don't have to worry about drowning. The staff of Children's Paradise are very loving and are very good at dealing with children, especially Kris, Orange, Seal and the teachers of the summer camp, which is the biggest plus point for this stay. By the way, the washbasin is super small, and you can't put two baby things in it. The hair dryer is not a Dyson, but an ancient Philips model. When you take it out, you will immediately have the illusion of going back 20 years in time. The Yalong Bay beach is being repaired, and the hotel cannot go directly to the beach, so you have to take the shuttle bus to the Hilton. Although, because of the highlights of the children's paradise, maybe I will bring children here in the futureüòÇüòÇ

msg:The whole environment of the hotel is upscale, quiet, relatively few people, the environment is quite satisfactory, the beach is also relatively few people compared to other hotels, the chef, Mr. Cai, is warm and thoughtful, and he takes good care of the baby meals. But I have to say that the hotel's service after the emergency occurred. On the third day of check-in, we left the room to go to the Chinese restaurant for lunch. During the period, the waiter went to the room to get the dry-cleaned clothes. When we finished the meal and returned to the room, the door of the room could not be opened. We called the staff on the same floor and they could not open it, so we notified the engineering staff. We were holding a one-year-old baby, and the child fell asleep. The engineering staff said that there was a problem with the chip and it could not be opened for a while. For more than half an hour, no staff member told us how to solve it temporarily. I took the initiative to ask to help us open a new room temporarily for the baby to rest and the adults to rest. I am still pregnant. After the lunch break, it was nearly 2 hours, and no staff member contacted us to ask if we needed anything for emergency, because all the baby's milk, diapers, etc., and our adult things were all locked in the room. Later, we went downstairs to check twice, but they said it couldn't be opened. When the child woke up, he was crying because he was hungry. We asked the kitchen to make some soft noodles to see if the child could eat. At this point, the service gap was too big, and there was no consideration for the needs and mood of the customers. The door lock was an accident, but it was still surprising that such a large hotel handled the emergency in this way.

posted:Posted November 8, 2021
msg:I booked a pool villa for three nights. The housekeeper Joanna called from the day before I checked into the hotel and asked what I need to prepare in the room in advance, what time of the flight, and whether I need to pick up the airport. The room I booked includes one pick-up Or drop off the airport, I took the child alone and chose to pick up the airport in order to save trouble. Because I used to call Sanya to find someone to book a car on the platform, it was too troublesome. This time the hotel arranged a BMW car to pick up and the driver even went to the exit to help pull my luggage and take me to the car! After arriving at the hotel and getting off the bus, Joanna was waiting at the door. After taking a photo at the front desk, she took her to the room to check in, and gave a clear introduction to the facilities, equipment, activities, etc.! Every morning, I will also ask me what arrangements I have for the day, and give suggestions, and help to book meals and seats. In short, if one person takes the baby to the Ritz-Carlton, there is no need to worry about it, the housekeeper is all about it! Asked if there was any sand dredging tool, Joanna directly gave a new set, but unfortunately, in the end, she didn't take it away to reduce the burden...Three days of itinerary, what you want to eat, what you want to play, tell the housekeeper, she will give advice and not bother! Awesome! The staff in the restaurant are also great. They will take the initiative to take care of me when I go to pick up the meal and leave the children alone, chat with her, and walk away silently when I see me coming. Although the details are small, it can be reflected. The Ritz-Carlton has put a lot of effort into employee service!
Room service will deliver fresh fruits every day. It is almost different every day. My child and I had a small amount of food. There were too many fruits to be eaten. At the end, a large plate was piled up before leaving!
The room attendant also used children's toys as a theme to stack two rabbits, and the children were too happy to take them apart.
The staff who led the parent-child activities were kind and enthusiastic. They were loved by the children. One day they took coconut picking. Only my child and I participated. The staff picked 3 for both of us, spoo
Finally, let me talk about some shortcomings: 1. The comb in the room is too low, is it almost serious like a comb in a small hotel?
2. It has been November. Although it is still very hot during the day, the swimming pool in the room is not at a constant temperature. You can't get water in the morning and at night. In the afternoon, you have to test your endurance. The public swimming pool is only slightly warmer than the water at the restaurant. Point, other nights will not work, the water is too hot in the afternoon, it is recommended to use the constant temperature swimming pool according to the body temperature, especially if you think about children;
3. The beach is still very delicate, but a bit narrow
I lived on a 3-day vacation, and I was taken care of meticulously. Thanks to the staff of Ritz-Carlton for their help and care!
Have a chance to come again next year!

A pool villa was set, and a three-day pure vacation mode was started.

Location traffic:
Nearer than Haitang Bay, but quieter and less prosperous; the traffic is actually OK, less than 20km away from the city center.

service:
Ritz-Carlton has always been known for its good service, and here is no exception. The service is very considerate and in place. Everyone is polite and comfortable.

Room view:
Blocked by a wall, you can't see the sea, you can only go to the public area; but the swimming pool area in the room is quite beautiful.

health:
The sanitary conditions are not bad, and the swimming pool is not very dirty.

Dinning room:
It's super big and there are too many people, but the service can still be basically guaranteed.

breakfast:
Very hearty, and the taste is okay; the complimentary brunch is very beautiful, very hearty, but the taste is average.

bed:
It's very comfortable, and it feels great to wake up naturally.

Room facilities:
The room is very large, and the living room is very convenient for eating; the bedroom is also very large and comfortable; the bathroom has a large bathtub, single person, and the bath is very comfortable; the cloakroom is also quite large, and the overall is very comfortable.

Cost performance:
A hotel with a strong sense of vacation, very comfortable, good service, basic facilities, and the price/performance ratio is quite high. It is very suitable for a family vacation.

Ritz is the preferred choice for global travel and will never be disappointed. Since the opening of this Sanya store, it must be punched in every year. Even if there is Park Hyatt, Capella, and magnificent, you still have to stay here for one night. There is no kids zone in Sanya, only this children's painting is left.

And the price is higher than that of the urban area. After all, environment and service are also included in the price. The drinks and services in the lobby bar are still pleasant.

Second, facing a wooden bridge, soaking in a private swimming pool feels like viewing. Animals; third, because facing the bridge, all the actions in the room are open, so the curtains must be closed and the sunshine in Sanya must be turned off. Is this still a vacation? ; Fourth, there is a passage next to it. Pedestrians can walk through the bushes to reach the courtyard. The mobile phone is placed on the table for fear of losing it at any time, and it is also afraid of someone coming in through doors and windows at night. In short, the room is very poor. This room may be provided by Ctrip, or it may be bullying me. I asked the hotel to change rooms, but unfortunately I waited a long time. This house should be sealed up or sold at a reduced price. Ctrip's package this time is the same as the price that Ritz sells on its own official account.

This is the trea**ent only when living in a villa before. Thank you Anna. This is a pleasant surprise.
