There are free sunscreens and tanning oils at the pool and beach, and free toys for different uses. The staff will come to take care of and deliver free fruits and water at any time, so don't be too considerate.
üçΩDining: The hotel‚Äôs breakfast is rich and delicious. Fresh coconuts and various tropical fruits are enough. The restaurant environment is also very good, and you can have a brunch in the less crowded season.
I experienced the set meal at the seaside restaurant at noon. I was worried about too much to eat (the breakfast buffet was too rich), but the portion was just a little bit more for two people, which might be more suitable for a family of three. However, the taste and ingredients are very good. The appetizers of green papaya and green mango, bread and fried cod are super delicious! !
In the evening, I went to the lobby bar for a drink. Although there is no live singing in the seaside restaurant, it is quiet and pleasant, suitable for a daze.
üöó Transportation: It takes about 40 minutes to take a taxi from Phoenix Airport. But to go to other places from the hotel can only take a taxi or consult the front desk specifically, because the hotel is on the mountain and the surrounding area is full of hotels, so there is nothing to go shopping nearby. It's about 7 kilometers away from the nearest Liupan Village, and it's quite convenient to take a taxi. There is a free shuttle bus to the duty-free shop, but you need to make a reservation one day in advance.
üè†Room: The sea view room is very good, you can see the sea from a distance, and there is a swimming pool in the hotel with your head down. There happened to be a coconut tree in front of our window, and we looked forward to the sunshine when we opened the curtains in the morning every day. The rooms are spacious, clean, quiet and comfortable, and not at all damp. The balcony can also sit and bask in the sun. The balcony on the 4th floor is shielded for privacy, and people on the other floors can be seen basking in the sun from the outside. The bathtub is also very clean. After playing in the water during the day and taking a bath at night, it is so enjoyable.
Overall: a perfect and unforgettable experience. During the short 5-day trip in Sanya, 4 days were spent in the hotel. Even so, I still feel more than enough. It is very suitable for a slow vacation where you just want to sunbathe in a daze to relieve stress, or a honeymoon trip for couples. It's so cool to be able to go to the sea during the off-peak period before the Mid-Autumn Festival. Looking forward to staying again next timeüèù

üßπ Hygiene: For an old top hotel like The Ritz-Carlton, there is really nothing to be picky about hygiene, the rooms are clean and tidy, and all public restrooms and every toilet have disinfectant alcohol, which is really too week in the current environment arrive!
üçÉEnvironment: Classic and elegant decoration style, some people may find it less foreign, but the combination of the entire architectural style and the seaside of Yalong Bay is just right. The rooms on the first floor are surrounded by swimming pools, and there is an infinity swimming pool near the sea. The point is that they are all constant temperature! Even in Haitang Bay, where there are many luxury hotels, there are not many swimming pools with constant temperature systems that adults can swim in (except for children's swimming pools). Several restaurants in the hotel are also very good, and the ingredients can be cooked (provided that Ignore the price üòÇ)
üîîService: The Ritz-Carlton is already famous for its meticulous and thoughtful service, so there is no need to elaborate. But this time I really have to praise it again, because this time I went to Sanya to encounter a confirmed case, and the entire Sanya hospital was full of nucleic acid tests, but the Ritz-Carlton Hotel directly invited certified professional laboratory personnel to the hotel for the purpose of The guests provide free inspections (as long as they make an appoin**ent before 3:00 p.m. on the same day or provide information directly on the spot), it saves hotel guests the time to go to the hospital and is relatively safer. When I checked out, I was a little excited (because I was going home üòÇ) and left the room card in the room. After talking to the front desk, I said it didn't matter. Someone will pick it up. I can check out with peace of mind.
The hotel's SPA can also be regarded as one of the top ones in China. There are two major brands of facial care, Valmont and Swiss Perfection, and it is said that it is the second SPA shop in China (but most people don't know, also Basically I can't find it, maybe because a certain review doesn't have it or it's too expensive üòÇ) The body SPA is so good that I don't have friends. The latest agarwood body oil and the very popular singing bowl relax, the body and skin are really tender and much more tender. And I did sleep more deeply at night (of course only for my feelings, after all, this kind of experience depends on personal feelings üòÑ)
The last thing is, recently, those who want to go directly to the sea from the hotel may have to walk a little to the hotel next door. Now the government is maintaining the beach, and the Ritz-Carlton is the first to start maintenance, so it will take at least a few months. It will be open, but it is also convenient to go to the hotel next door. There are inter-connected passages inside the hotel to pass through, so there is no need to go around the main entrance üòÑ

They said that they have recorded them one by one, and told that the time to arrive is also cleanable by those who have a room, and will not wait. But in fact, after I arrived at the hotel around 1:30, the 2 rooms were not cleaned.
2. Because we didn't have lunch, we went out of the hotel to eat. After we arrived at the hotel at 3:30, we only came out of a room. At this time, the front desk said that the other room would be ready soon, and someone would be arranged to send us the room directly. We waited in the room for nearly an hour, but no one sent the room card, called the front desk, and the phone said that it will be cleaned soon! Are the words "soon" and "immediately" your idioms! Are you fooling your guests like that? At this time, we couldn't bear it anymore. It was nearly 4 hours since we arrived at the hotel, and it was almost 5 pm. We still didn't get the key card for the other room. It was really a waste of all afternoon waiting. One thing to say, I have come to Sanya so many times, and I have stayed in hotels in Yalong Bay and Haitang Bay. It is really the first time I have encountered such a long wait for a room card, and it is a luxury brand that claims to be characterized by good service. , really disappointed.
3. The housekeeper service basically can't solve the problem. Whether it is asking if the room is out, or the check-out time, etc., it will take a long time to reply. If it is a matter of urgency, I suggest you don't ask. Of course, the attitude of the service is still OK
4. When I came to the hotel, I found out that the beach is actually doing engineering! ! ! ! ! We found this when we were going to the beach with our children. The entire beach was blocked, and no one notified us when we checked in, and there was no notice or apology when we entered the room! ! ! ! ! So what's the point of our coming to this hotel? Isn't the hotel has its own beach area just to be able to play in the sand with two steps? ! I can't understand why this hotel doesn't remind you in advance, doesn't remind you when you check in, and doesn't have any compensation! ! ! ! ! ! ! Isn't this a lie! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
5. The indoor children's paradise of the hotel is ridiculously small, and the things to play in it are very low. It is really unimaginable that a luxury hotel with a price of at least 2k a day for a room is so unbearable for children outside. The water facilities are also rudimentary. It is really the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. Don't tell me, this is not a hotel featuring parent-child hotels, but your basic equipment must meet the standard~ It's really bad! ! ! ! ! ! !
6. I had high expectations for the breakfast at his house, but it actually looks like the breakfast at the Hilton next door, but the Hilton is only more than 1k a day! ! ! ! ! ! The juices are all canned, not freshly squeezed, this is what the breakfast waiter said...
7. The carton design of the spare parts is anti-human, and it is invincible and difficult to disassemble. Really the lowest spare design I have ever seen.
I wrote so many bad things. Of course, it is a luxury brand after all, and there are also good things. For example, the little guys who get on and off at the door are very good. They are in place every time. Service, this is the best service I have experienced in any hotel.
To sum up, in terms of service, the best place for me to live in Sanya is probably Fairmont Haitang Bay; in terms of cost performance, I still strongly recommend Yalong Bay Hilton. Ritz...I'm really disappointed, and I won't choose this brand again in the future.

However, the Ritz team responded promptly. In the last two nights, they also upgraded the two-bedroom villa with sea view with a small swimming pool for free. There was a shuttle bus when they went out, and they gave away the passion fruit, dragon fruit, and lion photo frame that the child loved. Although I often stay in National Five Hotels, I can say that this kind of VIP service is difficult to enjoy in other hotels. When checking out, Anna also prepared a small gift for the child, which the child would hold when he went home to sleep. This trip can be said to be a perfect choice. Thanks again to the Ritz team!

The most comfortable service for me is not arrogant or impetuous, not hurried or slow, smiling in response, not overly indifferent, and not overly enthusiastic.
       Although the price of the villa is slightly higher, I feel that it is value for money, even super value for money. I think a good experience is not only a high-end accommodation environment, but also a good and sincere service. I feel this in Ritz . Be patient, meticulous, solve problems in a timely manner, and respond politely to guests' requests. This is the embodiment of quality, worthy of the name of a luxury hotel.

msg:The hotel has a good location, 40 minutes drive from the airport, 5 minutes drive from Baihuagu commercial center, 15 minutes walk from Dongrong Seafood Plaza.

The hotel staff are more polite. When welcoming guests in the lobby, they will send a chain made of shells. After the check-in, they will also send guests to the room. However, it is quite far away and it takes seven or eight minutes to walk.
The Ritz sea view room booked is on the 4th floor, so the balcony view is not good, and it seems that the sea is far away. The facilities are ok, but the drinks in the refrigerator are not free, which is rather surprising. There is a lot of mineral water. There are more swimming pools in the hotel, there are children only, more suitable for children. But most swimming pools have children and swimming rings. There is also a beach volleyball court across the pool, with beach chairs next to it, and down the stairs to the beach, the scenery is not bad.
The lobby is on the 3rd floor, and the breakfast is on the 1st floor. It is open from 7 am to 11 pm. After 9 pm, there is a high probability that you will need to queue up. The seats are still relatively small and the venue is not big enough. The variety is not rich, it's quite satisfactory. The breakfast at Westin Wanning is a little bit more variety. Fortunately, the taste is okay. However, there are a lot of children, and adults basically don't look at it. It feels messy.
The hotel has a self-service barbecue in the evening, near the beach, and there is also a band, but the 4 days we stayed have been booked.
Generally speaking, the cost performance is not high during the summer vacation, the experience is average, there are many children, and it is busy and noisy.

Usually we go after 9:30 and eat all-you-can-eat at noon. Serena who serves us is very thoughtful and responsive! Every morning and evening, we will ask how we need to wait. The hotel service is well done and the soundproofing effect is good. The environment is impeccable. The smell of the fragrance in the room should be my favorite place~~ Today I told my husband to wait until I have a baby and come back to the children‚Äôs playground. It‚Äôs a pity that I didn‚Äôt experience it Hahaha Yalong Bay must live the first place is understandable! Thank you Ritz Carlton for bringing such perfect memories to my honeymoon. PS Afternoon tea must be eaten. Not only the amount is sufficient but also the taste is great. You can book a wicker chair in advance and take pictures at the c position.
